item.title: Bootstrapping an Ubiquitous Ecosystem @ WEA'16
item.description:
I was happy to hear that my paper on Bootstrapping a Ubiquitous Monitoring Ecosystem (preprint online) was accepted for presentation at WEA (Workshop on Ecosystem Architectures) that will take place in Copenhagen and is colocated with ECSA.

The paper talks about some of the challenges and opportunities that come with bootstrapping a ubiquitous monitoring ecosystem. It is a case study inspired from our Zeeguu project.
